txt.en: Orcs have been hard at work chopping down trees and harvesting wood for their siege-weapons in Nîn-stazg.
The supplies you captured from the Orcs will be put to far better use in the hands of Floodwend's people. You did well to retrieve the wood stockpiles from the grip of Mordor.
'My lady Etta has sent us to protect the Thane. He should not go into battle, but he may observe the battle from here, should he wish it.'
'Look at them, tearing down our forest. We cannot let them go on!'
Orcs have been hard at work chopping down trees and harvesting wood for their siege-weapons in Nîn-stazg.
Orcs build siege-weapons in the forest south-east of Floodwend.\n\nYou should gather wood from the encampment where the Orcs have been chopping down trees.
The supplies you captured from the Orcs will be put to far better use in the hands of Floodwend's people. You did well to retrieve the wood stockpiles from the grip of Mordor.
